snippet: The discovery appears to brighten prospects for Norway's industry, which had not had much luck exploring in the Barents Sea until recently.
abstract: The discovery appears to brighten prospects for Norway's industry, which had not had much luck exploring in the Barents Sea until recently.
lead_paragraph: Statoil, the Norwegian oil company, reports a second big oil discovery in the Barents Sea in less than a year, brightening Norway's and the remote Arctic region's petroleum prospects. [Reuters]

headline.main: On Our Radar: Arctic Oil Discovery
